name: Czesio Adventure: aNOOOther Story
description: The full version of the worst game of 2020 is here! In this game you can not do anything fascinating, it is glitch, senseless and boring. It is not suitable for having a good time, especially if you want to impress someone and say that you created this game yourself. You will be ridiculed and ashamed. Don't worry though, if you are MLG Pro, you will go through this game without much embarrassment, and then you will gain my respect and admiration...
